src:
Jokowi Puji Airlangga Ketum 'Top' Golkar, Pro-Bamsoet Tak Masalah
07 Nov 2019, 18:07 by Eva Safitri
Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) memuji Ketum Golkar Airlangga Hartarto sebagai ketum yang top. Kader Golkar yang mendukung Bambang Soesatyo (Bamsoet) sebagai caketum Golkar mengaku tak masalah dengan pujian Jokowi ke Airlangga.
"Jika ada keberpihakan interpretasi dari beberapa kelompok kalangan mungkin saja ada keberpihakan presiden kepada orang tertentu saya kira nggak masalah. Misalnya Presiden, misalnya ini tentu interpretasi pemahamannya kalau dia memberikan dukungan pada salah satu calon adalah pembantunya itu nggak ada masalah, sah-sah saja," ujar Ketua Tim Suskes Bamsoet, Ahmadi Noor Supit, di Hotel Sultan, Jakarta Selatan, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Ahmadi mengatakan pujian Jokowi tidak akan mempengaruhi suara kader Golkar dalam pemilihan caketum. Dia menilai komentar apa pun yang datang dari luar Golkar merupakan hal yang wajar.
"Tapi yang pasti adalah secara struktural itu tidak bisa intervensi partai, jadi itu clear buat kita dan kami yakin Presiden tidak bermaksud intervensi, apalagi Partai Golkar ini partai besar jadi saya kira itu clear. Jadi jangan salah memahami. Buat kami itu dukung mendukung biasa sebagai teman boleh," katanya.
text:
Jokowi Praises Airlangga Ketum 'Top' Golkar, Pro-Bamsoet No Problem
Nov 7 2019, 18:07 by Eva Safitri
Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) praised Golkar Chairman Airlangga Hartarto as the top minister. Golkar cadre who supports Bambang Soesatyo (Bamsoet) as a Golkar caketum admitted that he had no problem with Jokowi's praise to Airlangga.
"If there is a partiality on the interpretation of some groups, there might be a partiality of the president to certain people. I think it does not matter. For example, the President, for example, this is certainly an interpretation of his understanding if he gives support to one of the candidates is his assistant, there is no problem, it is fine, "said Bamsoet Suskes Team Leader, Ahmadi Noor Supit, at the Sultan Hotel, South Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019).
Ahmadi said Jokowi's praise would not affect the votes of Golkar cadres in the caketum election. He considered that any comments coming from outside Golkar were natural.
"But what is certain is that structurally it cannot intervene in the party, so it is clear to us and we believe that the President does not intend to intervene, moreover the Golkar Party is a large party so I think it is clear. So don't misunderstand. For us it supports ordinary support as friends can, "he said.
